title: Bones and muscles (TEFC)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Body, Human
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Bones
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Muscles
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Human physiology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Human locomotion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Motor ability
description: Young Japanese athletes create awareness of how the human skeletal and muscular systems work together to allow movement of the body. A frog specimen shows how the muscles in the upper arm contract and relax so that arm bones can be moved. Discusses the functions of tendons, cartilage, and ligaments and examines various bones, joints, and vertebrae.
